Veliko dobre glasbe in tudi veliko prostora
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Peter Pirkovič

Renault scenic v podaljšani različici je pred nekaj meseci dobil novi dizelski motor, poleg tega pa razvaja še z obilico prostora in izboljšanim ozvočenjem proizvajalca Bose.



Rojen potovalnik, ki navdušuje z udobjem, prostornostjo in zmogljivim motorjem. Foto: Peter Pirkovič

Pred natanko dvema letoma se je na trgu pojavila nova generacija enoprostorca. Najbolj je izstopal po tem, da so nanj serijsko nameščena 20-palčna kolesa, z gumami zelo redkih dimenzij, ki jih na trgu ponujajo le izbrana gumarska podjetja. Takratni vihar kritik se je hitro polegel, prodaja je v zadnjih dveh letih ostala na približno enaki ravni, v vmesnem času pa so se vendarle zgodile nekatere spremembe na področju tehnike.
Grand scenic, ki sem ga preizkušal, je imel vgrajen nov 1,7-litrski dCi motor s 110 kilovati moči in z zadostno zalogo 380 Nm navora. Za tono in dobrih 800 kilogramov teže se zdi, da štirivaljnik dobro opravlja svoje delo, kajti po podatkih na papirju zmore tudi hitrost več kot 200 km/h. Motor je povezan s šeststopenjskim ročnim menjalnikom (na voljo je tudi šeststopenjski samodejni EDC), ki je morda najšibkejša točka avtomobila. Ima dolge hode in včasih je prestavljanje zatikajoče.
Tehnični podatkiDimenzije (D/Š/V): 4634 mm, 1866 mm, 1635 mmMotor: 1,7-litrski dizelski motor s 110 kW (150 KM)Navor: 340 Nm pri 1750 vrtljajihGume: 195/55/R20Posoda za gorivo: 50 litrovCena: 28.690 evrov (cena z dodatno opremo 29.690 evrov)
Zato pa avto na drugi strani uporabnika navdušuje s precej udobno predstavo na cesti. Kot tipičen potovalnik je doma na avtocestah, brez kančka strahu se zelo dobro odreže tudi na zavitih cestah. Poraba je vselej odvisna od voznika, a se nisem pretirano oddaljil od WLPT deklaracije, kjer piše, da je povprečje šest litrov. V mojem primeru sem v povprečju dosegal porabo 6,9 litra.
Velik prtljažnik
Drugi zelo pomemben adut, ki ga petsedežna konfiguracija (dodatek za dva dodatna sedeža znaša 1500 evrov) grand scenica s ponosom kaže, je prostornost potniške kabine. Ta je nadgrajena s številnimi dodatki, ki uporabniku olajšajo delo. Položaj za volanom je nadvse udoben, prav tako se bodo z visoko mero udobja srečevali tudi ostali potniki v avtomobilu, ki bodo malenkostno odvisni tudi od položaja vzdolžno pomične sredinske konzole, pred sovoznikom je skrit še 13-litrski odlagalni predal, a prostorsko superiornost bo pokazal velik, najmanj 533-litrski prtljažnik. Slednji je spet odvisen od položaja zadnje klopi (vzdolžno pomična), a mu bo pri preklopu naslona zadnje klopi in ustvarjanju dodatnega prostora zelo prav prišel gumb, ki celotno operacijo preobrazbe opravi samodejno. Tako je ustvarjeno ravno dno vse do sprednjih sedežev.
Med preizkusom sem v ta namen uspešno opravil nekaj priložnostnih prevozov, med katerimi je bil tudi nov hladilnik, ki sem ga z lahkoto pospravil v notranjost, a mi je zmanjkalo nekaj centimetrov prostora, ker testni grand scenic (v tej izvedbi) ni imel možnosti preklopa sovozniškega sedeža. Sicer bi bilo vse skupaj zelo elegantno delo. A to so le malenkosti. Za večino ostalih prevozov je ta avto preprosto idealen.
Ročnega menjalnika ni v ceniku
Paket Bose v prvi vrsti prinaša zares dobro ozvočenje z enajstimi zvočniki, radijskim sistemom z DAB+ funkcijo, tomtomovo navigacijo, vse to pa je povezano z multimedijskim sistemom R-Link2. Še vedno smo mnenja, da je ta malce neposrečen zaradi zapletenega preskakovanja med meniji in počasnosti delovanja, kar navsezadnje vpliva tudi na varnost med vožnjo.
Dodatno je Bose deležen še odličnih LED žarometov, dvobarvne karoserije, usnjenega volana in posebnih 20-palčnih platišč. Osnovna cena znaša 28.690 evrov, z nekaj dodatne varnostne opreme (city plus) in gretjem sprednjih sedežev, končna cena ne preseže 30 tisočakov. A pozor. Takšnega avtomobila pravzaprav ne morete kupiti, saj ga v uradnem ceniku preprosto ni. Menda zato, ker spodbujajo nakup s kombinacijo EDC menjalnika.


V zadku je na voljo več kot 1500 litrov prostora. S preklopom naslona zadnje klopi se ustvari ravno dno do sprednjih sedežev. Foto: Peter Pirkovič
text:
Lots of good music and also a lot of space
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Peter Pirkovic

The Renault scenic in the extended version got a new diesel engine a few months ago and also boasts plenty of space and improved Bose sound system.



Born traveler who impresses with comfort, spaciousness and powerful engine. Photo by Peter Pirkovich

Exactly two years ago, a new generation of one-offs appeared on the market. What stood out the most was the fact that they were fitted as standard with 20-inch wheels, with tires of very rare dimensions offered on the market only by selected tire companies. The storm of criticism at the time quickly subsided, with sales remaining at approximately the same level over the past two years, but in the meantime, some changes in the field of technology have occurred.
The grand scenic I tested had a new 1.7-liter dCi engine with 110 kilowatts of power and a sufficient stock of 380 Nm of torque. For a ton and a good 800 pounds of weight, the four-cylinder seems to do its job well, because according to the paper, it can handle speeds of more than 200 km / h. The engine is mated to a six-speed manual gearbox (a six-speed automatic EDC is also available), which may be the car's weakest point. It has long strokes and sometimes the shift is jamming.
SpecificationsDimensions (L / W / H): 4634 mm, 1866 mm, 1635 mmMotor: 1.7-liter 110 kW (150 hp) diesel engine Torque: 340 Nm at 1750 rpmTires: 195/55 / R20Fuel tank: 50 litersPrice: $ 28,690 (price with accessories $ 29,690)
Therefore, the car on the other hand impresses the user with a fairly comfortable performance on the road. As a typical traveler, he is at home on the highways, without a touch of fear he also performs well on winding roads. Consumption always depends on the driver, but I have not gone too far from the WLPT declaration, which states that the average is six liters. In my case, I was on average consuming 6.9 liters.
Big trunk
Another very important trump card that the five-seater configuration (the extra for two extra seats is $ 1,500) grand scenica proudly shows is the spaciousness of the cabin. This one is upgraded with a number of accessories that make it easy for the user to work with. The position behind the steering wheel is extremely comfortable, as will the other passengers in the car, who will be slightly dependent on the position of the longitudinally movable center console, with a high degree of comfort. a large, at least 533-liter boot. The latter, again, depends on the position of the rear bench (longitudinally sliding), but when switching the back of the rear bench and creating additional space, it will come very well button that performs the entire transformation operation automatically. This creates a flat bottom all the way to the front seats.
During the test, I successfully completed some occasional transports for this purpose, including a new cooler, which I could easily put inside, but I ran out of inches because the test grand scenic (in this version) had no possibility of switching front passenger seat. Otherwise, it would be a very elegant job. But these are only small things. For most other transports, this car is simply ideal.
The manual transmission is not included in the price list
The Bose package, first and foremost, delivers really good sound with eleven speakers, a radio system with DAB + function, tomtom navigation, all connected to the R-Link2 multimedia system. We are still of the opinion that this is a bit unlucky because of the complicated menu skipping and slowness of operation, which ultimately affects driving safety.
In addition, the Bose comes with excellent LED headlamps, two-tone bodywork, leather steering wheel and special 20-inch wheels. The base price is € 28,690, with some extra safety equipment (city plus) and heated front seats, the final price does not exceed 30 thousand. And be careful. In fact, you cannot buy a car like this, since it simply does not exist in the official price list. Presumably because they encourage purchase with a combination of EDC gearbox.


The rear has more than 1500 liters of space available. Folding the back of the rear bench creates a flat bottom to the front seats. Photo by Peter Pirkovich
